content:
In order to promote the work going in on the GL SIG, I'm going to be posting "Last month in Wasm" updates on Mastodon based on the updates in the monthly GL SIG meeting.

Here are this months posts:
C#/.NET - https://hachyderm.io/@esoterra/111541080911795810
Go - https://hachyderm.io/@esoterra/111541084535880039
JavaScript - https://hachyderm.io/@esoterra/111541086077071975
Python - https://hachyderm.io/@esoterra/111541087510680105
